thread.title: Trump doesn't correct man who calls Obama a Muslim - CNN Video
thread.title_full: Trump doesn't correct man who calls Obama a Muslim - CNN Video

title: Trump doesn't correct man who calls Obama a Muslim - CNN Video
text:
CNN.com
Trump doesn't correct man who calls Obama a Muslim JUST WATCHED Source: CNN Added on 1108 GMT (1808 HKT) September 18, 2015 At a campaign rally, Republican frontrunner Donald Trump does not correct one of his supporters when he calls Obama a Muslim.
Trump doesn't challenge anti-Muslim questioner at event By Theodore Schleifer, CNN Donald Trump came under fire Thursday night for his handling of a question at a town hall about when the U.S. can "get rid" of Muslims, declining to take issue with that premise and an assertion that President Barack Obama is Muslim.
More from Politics
